text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump @Mike_Pence When did that change? Up until now, Trump’s highest priority has been to minimize any negative impact of the COVID-19 crisis to his reelection campaign. His second priority has been to falsely point out how past administrations made mistakes in completely different circumstances.
